description:
Owner of the restaurant "Nexus" (and "Master" is the "Japanese" term for this).
The original credit (even in Wikipedia) reads "UEXUSのマスター" but during http://anidb.net/e11965 [the episode] the sign of his restaurant is clearly visible, with a baroque "NEXUS" lettering so this is most likely a reading error by the anime staff who wrote the credits.
name: Nexus no Master
